Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended for comfort, cleanliness, location & value”
Reviews.Author: Gina B
Reviews.Content: highly recommend al canal hotel am surprised read comments travellers negative stayed easter 2011 arranged parents stay easter 2012 staff recognised connection upgraded parents view experience brilliant ours friendly staff marco michele clean modern comfortable excellent location overall superb value money return hotel recommend friends colleagues grazie mille staff al canal

Reviews.Title: “Great location, modern room, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Sonia B
Reviews.Content: son stayed al canal 5 trip venice enjoyed hotel location crowds extremely friendly staff thank marco leave 6 am morning catch flight couldnt breakfast served 830 am till 1030 am staff provided tray fresh food fridge didnt leave empty stomach true reception covered night instructions openclose entrance courtyard theres call assistance absolutely arrangement safe quiet venice remember venice expensive city stay expensive eg london paris recommend book advance deal
